title: Rachel's Cranberry Chicken Salad Recipe
description: A light cranberry chicken salad with the sweetness of dried cranberries and the crunch of pecans. This can be served in a sandwich or eaten as is.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Salad Rachel's Cranberry Chicken Salad 4.8 (233) 191 Reviews 21 Photos This cranberry chicken salad is a great sandwich filling that they make at the diner in the hospital where I work, but I fancied it up a bit with some green onions and pecans. A great way to use up leftover chicken. Delicious! Submitted by Rachel Mehl Updated on October 31, 2023 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 21 21 21 21 Prep Time: 15 mins Total Time: 15 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 2 cooked chicken breast halves, chopped ½ cup mayonnaise, or to taste 2 green onions, chopped ½ cup sweetened dried cranberries (such as Ocean Spray® Craisins®) ¼ green apple, shredded ¼ cup chopped pecans 1 tablespoon lime juice ¼ teaspoon dried dill weed 1 pinch salt and black pepper, or to taste Directions Mix together chicken and mayonnaise in a bowl, stir to coat well. Stir in green onions, dried cranberries, apple, pecans, lime juice, dill weed, salt, and pepper. Serve immediately or refrigerate for several hours or overnight (the flavor just gets better). Recipe Tip For a fresher flavor, use 1 tablespoon fresh chopped dill instead of dried. I Made It Print 408 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 384 Calories 30g Fat 16g Carbs 14g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 384 % Daily Value * Total Fat 30g 39% Saturated Fat 5g 24% Cholesterol 46mg 15% Sodium 187mg 8% Total Carbohydrate 16g 6% Dietary Fiber 2g 6% Total Sugars 11g Protein 14g 28% Vitamin C 3mg 3% Calcium 20mg 2% Iron 1mg 4% Potassium 153mg 3% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Rachel's Cranberry Chicken Salad 01 of 21 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 21 Photo by  TimidApple1027 03/26/2023 Absolutely delicious!!! I added extra berries and pecans and my favorite cajun seasoning. My children even ate it!!!! I will be making it again!! 03 of 21 Photo by  THEBACCHUS 04/25/2020 Delicious and easy! With canned chicken and my fresh chives substituted for the green onions, I had everything on hand. To me, the lime juice is the key - I used bottled as I didn’t have fresh limes. I have made this before with chicken breast cooked overnight in the slow cooker and it’s delicious that way, as well! 04 of 21 Photo by  nstar_80 03/08/2020 05 of 21 Photo by  moose 02/08/2020 06 of 21 Photo by  Erin 08/25/2019 07 of 21 Photo by  Lonnie 08/18/2019 08 of 21 Photo by  Nancy Creech Schanne 01/19/2019 09 of 21 Photo by  Dave Thompson 04/21/2018 10 of 21 Photo by  shibish4 04/25/2017 Used Vegenaise instead of real mayo. Substituted celery for the apples, and pepitas for the pecans, only because I did not have them on hand. 1 2 3 Next You’ll Also Love Easy Fruited Chicken Salad 27 Ratings Chicken Salad with Apples, Grapes, and Walnuts 95 Ratings Simply The Best Chicken Waldorf Salad 48 Ratings Holiday Chicken Salad 1,777 Ratings Julie's Chicken Salad 44 Ratings Chicken Salad My Way 18 Ratings Dijon Chicken Salad 68 Ratings Filipino Chicken Salad 11 Ratings Creamy Avocado Chicken Salad 19 Ratings Asian Chicken Salad Cups 4 Ratings Originals Oven Roasted Chicken Salad Mason Jar 3 Ratings Warm and Limey Chicken Salad 30 Ratings Tara's Sweet and Chunky Chicken Salad 98 Ratings Vietnamese Chicken Salad 49 Ratings Cherry Chicken Salad 113 Ratings Party Chicken Salad 47 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Rachel Mehl
instructions: Mix together chicken and mayonnaise in a bowl, stir to coat well. Stir in green onions, dried cranberries, apple, pecans, lime juice, dill weed, salt, and pepper.;Serve immediately or refrigerate for several hours or overnight (the flavor just gets better).
